Topic.Title: Hanging from a tree is better than hanging by a thread

Posts.EditableText:
Hmmm, you must've taken my post in the "Lands of Unknown" thread as an insult to you.  I wasn't insulting you or being snide.  When I play a game that is not enjoying based on the form of the game, I usually laugh to myself and wonder why the programmer jumped the gun and put it out.  It's like a form of negative advertising.

Ok spew out all of your hate for me... GO!

(or kindly explain why you have not written one nice post about me, and be serious... or just forget the whole war and move on :})

I don't chit-chat in that manner in other threads, just in the Chat-section. I find it disrespectful to the topic. :}

I've never been to the Land of the Unknown so I'm not sure what you are talking about...?  

But I hope for your sake that people aren't going to spew out hate for you.  

Nobody has ever said anything nice about me here either so don't go fishing for something that isn't there.  Why can't people just be nice?  I don't know....it might just be too hard for some.  

IMHO, Mean People SUCK!
